desc: Lait+Co candles are made from organic coconut wax and sustainably-farmed beeswax blend, which burns cleaner and longer. Crafted in micro-batches in Singapore. With a passion for candles and the cozy memories they evoke, Lait+Co candles were born with the aim of creating natural, accessible and original candles.

layout.text: Immerse yourself in a scent-sory experience at TBHT Plant Club, be delighted and surprised with the multiple fragrance combinations you can create with LAIT+CO.
